WRITING.TITLE: Struggle to listen in noisy environments may indicate trouble with reading later in life

WRITING.TEXT: Triglycerides fluctuate even during a single day - lowest at 3 a.m., rising until mid-afternoon and decreasing thereafter.Unhealthy weekend behavior [affects weight](http://www.karger.com/Article/FullText/356147) too, but for many people is OK, as they compensate for weekend splurges on weekdays. Long-term habits make more of a difference.

WRITING.TITLE: Having a mutation does not always lead to a condition that looks like a textbook case

WRITING.TEXT: Similar to supertasters: it is a superpower (they make great sommeliers food tasters) and a burden (as sensory extremes will hurt)

WRITING.TITLE: By 55+, 1/4 of skin cells carry cancer-driving mutations caused by sun exposure and its perfectly normal

WRITING.TEXT: Myxobacteria is the most fascinating social bacteria. It [was known] (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/22511878) they exchange outer membrane lipoproteins to coordinate behaviors, but exchange of lipopolysaccharides to repair each other is even more striking. Myxobacteria produces many useful chemicals including antibiotics. Another proof that getting your hands in the dirt has health benefits.

WRITING.TITLE: Weighing The Promises Of Big Genomics
